summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the behavior of the SCTP transport layer used in WebRTC, covering connection setup, data channel negotiation, packet transmission and reception, congestion and flow control, timer handling, error handling, and edge‑case scenarios.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, robustness and standards compliance of the SCTP transport implementation to support reliable real‑time communication in WebRTC applications and prevent regressions during development.
